analyzed: tela madhu phāṇita maccha masa khīra dadhi viññāpana sikkhāpada

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.

original: Kassa sampannaṁ na manāpaṁ, kassa sāduṁ na ruccatī”ti.
analyzed: kassa sampannam na manāpa kassa sādum na ruccati iti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjissantī”ti … pe …

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ dadhim viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti

original: Netaṁ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya … pe …
analyzed: na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—

original: ‘gārayhaṁ, ayye, dhammaṁ āpajjiṁ asappāyaṁ pāṭidesanīyaṁ, taṁ paṭidesemī’”ti.
analyzed: gārayha ayye dhammaṃ āpajjim asappāyam pāṭidesanīya tam paṭidesemi iti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo gilānā honti.

original: idāni pana ‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti kukkuccāyantā na viññāpema, tena no na phāsu hotī”ti … pe …

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—

analyzed: gārayha ayye dhammaṃ āpajjim asappāyam pāṭidesanīya tam paṭidesemi iti

original: yassā vinā dadhinā na phāsu hoti.
